column5: is it just us canadians getting those infomercials? there all from toronto and man are they annoying. just a quick question...

... Whats the quick question ???  I think if you have watched WFN you have saw every infomercial there is !  I still need to pick up my SHAMWOW !!!! also, have you saw the new knot-less hook ??? WEAAAK !
Quit watching all the TV programs and commercials you don't like and 99% of your problems will be solved.
You are watching Charlie Moore TV!
honestly.. he has too much time on his hands
at 16? wow you must be doing something wrong...
Ya, at 16 most guys would be trying to get l___, never mind getting laid off..

i worked as a macanics assistant... 3 of our main macanics are laid off and 2 macanic assistants. i did not do anything wrong ang that was an ignorant post. the economic crisis hit us hard here in sudbury. you should think before you speak. that pisses me off.  i would go fishing but my dad is a police officer on the special responce unit and my mother is in afganistan. so i go mabea twice a week. another jerkoff comment.

My girlfriends aunt gave us a shamwow and its the biggest crock of crap ive seen . Its basically jsut a chunk of felt. I tried soaking up some water and all it did was smear it around.  I also think the shamwow crazy eye guy killed billy mays
HEY!!!   Its the trimmer technology I have been waiting for!!!!!!!!!

Im sorry to hear about your mother.But since youve got here youve irritated some people including me. I didnt ask for your life story didnt ask for anything about you. And if you took me serious about the fishing thing thats your perogative .
